item.title: I Quit My Job (The Journey Begins)
item.description: I finally quit my job. So I discuss how I feel with where I’m at. That includes what I hope to start consistently doing, what I still struggle with, and my philosophies.

item.title: November Backlogs
item.description: All my November blogs rolled into one. I talk about underground bands like Julie and Waveform as well as other big bands and artists like Pixies, Dave Grohl, and Tyler, the Creator. All this and I still remain at my corporate job.

item.title: October Backlogs
item.description: All of my October backlogs. In these first posts I talk about the reasons I’m making it and some other personal jargon.
